title: When a Riven player laughs at you for picking Taric top

replies.body: What if she just roams and kills your teammates and snowballs other lanes instead?

> What if she just roams and kills your teammates and snowballs other lanes instead?

If you made the calls for MIA, a lot of the times its your team's fault the enemy team gets anything other than Dragon at most. Should not blame yourself if you the people you're allied with during the time ends up killing themselves.

Well my whole question is what does Taric do to stop her from doing that. He doesn't look like he is gonna push that fast if left alone and he certainly wont keep up with her if she starts roaming. I mean you said it yourself MIA is only effective if people take notice and react accordingly and lets be real, who ever does. I just don't see how that match up would be that bad, if you know you can't kill him don't waste time just look for opportunites else where since its not like your leaving a nasus, jax, or trynd by themselves.

You are unranked. People in Gold and above should listen to mias. Not that they always do, but I find them listening to them 80% of the time. Also because I insist a lot with the pings when I think there is real danger.

I'm not sure what your trying to accomplish with this comment, you didn't insult me and you didn't enlighten me of anything. Just kinda randomly rambling bout nothing really.
Say goodbye to all of your top towers this pre-season.
Can Taric actually clear waves and take towers quickly though? I mean I don't see him pushing that fast tbh if left alone.

Keep in mind his passive is bonus on-hit damage after an ability, and he tends to buy sheen early. He's not the fastest, but he's probably decent (I don't do it enough to know for certain. But I'm speculating based on how fast towers melt this pre-season. I had a game where a kennen and taric backdoored 2 lane towers, an inhib, and both nexus towers, AND the nexus, in the time it took us to finish a teamfight and push a couple towers mid. Of course, nobody responded to stop them in time because HOW THE HECK DOES A KENNEN/TARIC COMBO DO THAT???!!! I don't think anyone was prepared for the thought that that was actually a threat.)

While it is true that he usually will lose the farm game against most of laners, he has a decent clear with his w and especially once he has {{item:3025}} or/and {{item:3068}} 
He can take turrets faster than people use to think thanks to his ultimate giving him extra AD and AP. Especially once he has {{item:3025}} he can also spam his Q and W to get the proc of both the item and his passive. 
If you check my last match with him on ranked you can see how I got two turrets the moment Riven went another lane:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2016362339/212202356?tab=overview
(the second turret appear as killed by minions right after the one that I took)
Well... I uhhh... See your choice of runes... And am a tad confused...
Oh I see they didn't have a jungle, that explains why you had so much freedom in the lane. Yeah bad opponents really help these sort of things.
You talk too much. They did have a jungler. Actually the only moments were they could get me was with three men ganks Riven + annie + rengar.

Rengar was 2/14 he was probably worse than an afk because afks don't give the other team gold. Im just saying you won with this one time and are making a thread like its a fool proof plan that will always work? and Riven is shit this patch anyway so its not a big acomplishment to beat her, its like beating an urgot or Kog'maw right now its pretty much expected.
I make sure i call mia at least 4 times when I don't see her.
